question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. temple
B. man in white
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man in white is sitting on a bench in the foreground, surrounded by pigeons, while the temple is clearly in the distant background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
